National Instructional Television Library
This Library in conjunction with regional libraries, publishes "A
Guide to Films, Kinescopes, and Video Tapes Available for
Televised Use,11 This Guide describes television courses which
are available in recorded form. It is also a catalogue of "samp-
lerkits." Each sampler kit contains a 16 mm kinescope recorded
film of a representative lesson in a series and two sets of related
printed material.
